title: With so many champions having their own theme...
body:
Would it be hard to let them have little overlays in the beginning of the match, personal to each players pick? 

I would love to be playing someone like Asol, or Pyke and have their themes play for a little bit in the beginning like they did for Swain and Worlds. That would be so cool!

replies.body: some champs doesnâ€™t even have themes though.

Just play jhin everygame and your wish is granted
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
they should give the option to let you play the champs theme instead of the summoners rift theme
